source.name: Recalls API
source.description: This Recalls API allows you to tap into a list of (1) drug and food safety recalls from the Food and Drug Administration, Food Safety and Inspection Service, and FoodSafety.gov; (2) car safety recalls from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration; and (3) product safety recalls from the Consumer Product Safety Commission.

datasets.name: Recalls API
datasets.description: This Recalls API allows you to tap into a list of (1) drug and food safety recalls from the Food and Drug Administration, Food Safety and Inspection Service, and FoodSafety.gov; (2) car safety recalls from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration; and (3) product safety recalls from the Consumer Product Safety Commission.
